item.description:
Our first Chinese playdate. Yay!

We'll have a bit of structured Chinese language play led by our summer guest Michelle (a Chinese college student majoring in teaching Chinese as a foreign language), and we'll discuss how to go about future playdates.

Street parking is usually not a problem during the day. If you'd rather take the T, we are a short 8-10 min walk from Ashmont station.

Please note, we have 3 cats. If you or your child is allergic, leave a comment or send me a message, so that we can set up an alternate location.
item.name: Mandarin playdate
